body:
Hi Everyone,



I having some trouble with the create legend component. I keep getting "to many values to unpack". I get this error with all data I plug in to the the component. The component is up to date (version 0.59) and just to be sure I reinstalled all ladybug's user object components. Any thoughts?



Gr,



Sam

replies.body: It was a bug in the release which we fixed it right after the release. It should work fine if you use the new version. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pJanJcsrIwHip5ucn2Va1X2bJb5f-ZgICrp8uDJQpYmnvWX9fGVO425cItH8weDX4oTbNYk754XFU4RyROdNaoQcPXpM6I5*/legend.png)

Sam,

To clarify, if you sync with the version on the github, the component is fixed.  I just fixed this bug a few days ago:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/24254e3553461cf6...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/24254e3553461cf6c80f68248eb1213955da8886)

-Chris

Yes. Works perfectly now. Thanks guys.

Gr,

Sam
Hi Im having the same problem yet i dont understand how to sycn?

Download the zip [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug)



or use Ladybug_Update Ladybug
